title: 天皇賞（春）の後に・敗北後と次の夢

text_block_list.text: The result was conceding victory in the 'Tenno Sho (Spring)'. While praising the other participating Umamusume, she is determined to win next time.
The next target race is the 'Takara-zuka Kinen'. The next morning, when heading out for self-training, she sees Mejiro McQueen running hard.
Impressed by Matikanetannhauser's stoic running to achieve further growth in the 'Takara-zuka Kinen'.
Two months later, the G1 middle-distance race 'Takarazakura Kinen'. To seize victory, I want to train with all my might!
